title: If vaccines don't cause autism, then how do you explain all this evidence?
author: Steve Kirsch
description: We see an odds ratio of 5 when comparing autism in vaxxed vs. unvaxxed in MULTIPLE studies. The before:after odds are even more extraordinary. How can we ignore all this evidence?
